label: Medical Practices and Clinics
description: Market category encompassing search queries related to medical practices and clinics.
intents: Find a medical practice or clinic near me
Buy or sell a medical practice
Book an appointment with a private GP
Get a sick note or repeat prescription
Find a job in a medical practice or clinic

subcategories.label: Private General Practitioners
subcategories.description: Medical practices that provide primary care services to private patients.

subcategories.label: Travel Clinics
subcategories.description: Clinics that provide travel vaccinations and advice to people traveling abroad.

subcategories.label: Podiatrists and Chiropodists
subcategories.description: Medical professionals that specialize in foot and ankle care.

subcategories.label: Chiropractors
subcategories.description: Medical professionals that specialize in diagnosing and treating musculoskeletal problems.

subcategories.label: Osteopaths
subcategories.description: Medical professionals that specialize in diagnosing and treating musculoskeletal problems.

subcategories.label: Medical Equipment and Furniture
subcategories.description: Suppliers of medical equipment and furniture to medical practices and clinics.

subcategories.label: Medical Jobs
subcategories.description: Job listings and recruitment services for medical practices and clinics.
